A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a horrible and lazy job of writing.  Seriously\, the ships are fast enough to pull away from first order in a few minutes but over 18 hours they can't even get out of weapons range?  Flying across the galaxy and back in 18 hours at lightspeed? Flying through space and not dying without a suit?  Luke just dying? Snoke just dying? I bet they didn't know who he was either so they just killed him off.... geez.
